summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1271 for the improvement of Thirty-first Avenue and Thirty-first Avenue North from Arlington Place to East John Street; Thirty-second Avenue, from East Spring Street to East Pine Street; East Pine Street, from Thirty-second Avenue to Thirty-first Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein sewers of proper dimensions, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13963 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
